question: Which among the following is the main purpose of the “Kisan Rath” mobile app?
option2: Facilitate sellers and buyers of agriculture produce
option3: Facilitate farmers & traders in searching for transport vehicles for movement of Agriculture & Horticulture produce
answer: Facilitate farmers & traders in searching for transport vehicles for movement of Agriculture & Horticulture produce
explanation: The Union Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare launched “Kisan Rath” mobile app, a mobile application to facilitate farmers & traders in searching for transport vehicles for the movement of Agriculture & Horticulture produce.
